title: Remove certifications gallery from portfolio

requirements.text: Remove the CertificationsGallery component import and render from the main App.tsx component

quotes: Delete the certification gallery from the portfolio

acceptanceCriteria: The CertificationsGallery component is no longer imported in App.tsx
The <CertificationsGallery /> element is removed from the component tree
The portfolio renders without the certifications gallery section

requirements.text: Delete the CertificationsGallery.tsx component file from frontend/src/components/

quotes: Delete the certification gallery from the portfolio

acceptanceCriteria: The frontend/src/components/CertificationsGallery.tsx file is removed from the project

requirements.text: Delete the CertificateModal.tsx component file from frontend/src/components/

quotes: Delete the certification gallery from the portfolio

acceptanceCriteria: The frontend/src/components/CertificateModal.tsx file is removed from the project

constraints: Do not modify other portfolio sections (Hero, Professional Summary, Core Competencies, Education, Professional Certifications, Professional Experience, Research Papers, Interests)
Maintain the existing layout structure and spacing between remaining sections
nonGoals: Removing certification images from the assets directory
Removing the Professional Certifications text section
